title.narrative: Research Into Use Programme - Scaling Up Outputs From DFID's Natural Resources Research

description.narrative: This activity (Research Into Use Programme - Scaling Up Outputs From DFID's Natural Resources Research) is a component of Research Into Use Programme - Scaling Up Outputs From DFID's Natural Resources Research reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £42,392,780. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural policy and administrative management, Agricultural development, Livestock, Environmental policy and administrative management, Environmental research. , with the following implementing partners: University of Edinburgh. The start date is 01-06-2006 and the end date is 31-03-2013.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
